title: InterVideo WinDVD Media Center
description:
[img]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/7233/iht2uy5.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/7458/iht3gq2.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/9122/iht4zr9.jpg[/img]

[b]Description:[/b]

WinDVD Media Center is a software network media player for DVDs, video, music and photos. Seamlessly connect PCs, laptops, PDAs and mobile phones over a UPnP (Universal Plug and Play) home network, and view and burn your videos and data to CDs and DVDs. 

What is UPnP?
Universal Plug and Play makes home networking child\&#039;s play. Simply connect PCs, mobile phones, PDAs and other digital devices, using the Web to share video, photos, music and more in and around the home.

[b]More Info:[/b]

[url]http://www.intervideo.com/jsp/WinDVDMCE_Profile.jsp[/url]

*******************************************************************************************

[b]Includes:[/b]

InterVideo WinDVD Media Center 3.2.77.21
InterVideo WinDVD Media Center 3.2.77.21 keygen

*******************************************************************************************

[b]Instructions:[/b]

1. Install InterVideo WinDVD Media Center.
2. Reboot when asked.
3. Use the keygen to generate a serial.
4. Launch InterVideo WinDVD Media Center.
5. Enter serial generated from the keygen.
6. Block from accessing the Internet.
7. Enjoy!

*******************************************************************************************

[b]Please help seed when you are done!  Thanks & Enjoy![/b]
